name: Passr
tagline: A web script to electronically distribute passes to students.
body:
![Passport for Schools](https://github.com/poster983/passport/blob/gh-pages/images/PassportHeader.png)

Passport is a program that allows schools to easily implement an open souse (MIT) library pass distribution system. 

# Demo
<http://lec.josephhassell.com>

# Wiki  
See the [https://github.com/poster983/passport/wiki](Wiki) for further documentation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
